tool_description: Determines optimal venue routing for orders based on market conditions, venue availability, and execution quality metrics.

available_venues.description: List of connected and available trading venues

routing_strategy.description: Routing strategy: best_price, smart_order_routing, volume_weighted, cost_minimization

error_messages: No available venues: All specified venues are disconnected or unavailable for this symbol.

usage: Provide symbol, side, quantity, and list of available venues. The tool will recommend optimal routing based on the selected strategy.

venue_allocation.description: List of venue allocations in format 'venue:percentage'
